jhservices.title: CBT
jhservices.description: Cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT) is a talking therapy that can help you manage your problems by changing the way you think and behave.

jhservices.title: Hypnotherapy
jhservices.description: Curative hypnotherapy is a method of working purely with the subconscious mind to understand and correct specific details which have played a part in the initial creation of a symptom.

jhservices.title: Mental Health & Wellbeing
jhservices.description: Mental health includes our emotional, psychological, and social well-being. It affects how we think, feel, and act.

jhservices.title: Yin Yoga Therapy
jhservices.description: An instant stress relief button! Yin is the most accessible of the physical yoga systems and can be practised by anyone
